name: Ricky Recharge
description:
Charge, Zapp, Dodge, Recharge and Blast your way trough and endless stream of robots.
Ricky Recharge is a dark but humorist take on a little boy trying to defend his home from an inevitable robot apocalypse.
In this 2.5D shoot ‘em up you are trying to achieve the highest score while staying alive as long as possible.
Use your fuel wisely and try to synchronise the polarity of your gun to the robots to score maximum points!
Run back and forth to be able to recharge your gun, and use your hard earned coins to upgrade your abilities!
